name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo image used for the theme. Supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files.

name: twitter
label: Twitter Username
description: The Twitter Username (no @) to link on the site template. Leave this empty to remove the Twitter link.

name: facebook
label: Facebook URL
description: The Facebook URL to link on the site template. Leave this empty to remove the Facebook link.

name: linkedin
label: LinkedIn URL
description: The LinkedIn URL to link on the site template. Leave this empty to remove the LinkedIn link.

name: space_1
label: Space 1
description: This setting controls the first space on the homepage below the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('news_list.html','Featured News with list'),('articles_list.html','Featured Article with list')] #<box_list>

name: space_2
label: Space 2
description: This setting controls the second space on the homepage below the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('news_list.html','Featured News with list'),('articles_list.html','Featured Article with list')] #<box_list>

name: space_3
label: Space 3
description: This setting controls the third space on the homepage below the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('news_list.html','Featured News with list'),('articles_list.html','Featured Article with list')] #<box_list>

name: space_4
label: Space 4
description: This setting controls the left hand side space under the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('stories_sponsors.html','Sponsor List'),('single_event.html','Single Event'),('boxes_group.html','Boxes Group'),('rss_feed_list.html','RSS Feed list'),('vents_list_daybox.html','Events Daybox')] #<box_list>

name: space_5
label: Space 5
description: This setting controls the right small space under the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('stories_sponsors.html','Sponsor List'),('single_event.html','Single Event'),('boxes_group.html','Boxes Group'),('rss_feed_list.html','RSS Feed list'),('vents_list_daybox.html','Events Daybox')] #<box_list>

name: space_6
label: Space 6
description: This setting controls the second space in the sidebar. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('directories_list_title.html','Directory List with Title'),('events_list_title_date_time.html','Events List with Title Date'),('jobs_list_title_location.html','Jobs List'),('boxes_group.html','Boxes Group'),('rss_feed_list.html','RSS Feed list')] #<box_list>

name: space_7
label: Space 7
description: This setting controls the third space in the sidebar. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
